review: I've had a Chromecast for over a year now and I still love it! My dad's a technology neanderthal and even he can use it. The only thing it doesn't do is play movies I bought via iTunes, but considering how much it does do (everything else!) and the considerable price difference, I don't mind having to physically hook my laptop to the TV to watch iTunes movies. And it is so very easy to use! Just open an app on your phone that is Chromecast compatible, select the cast button, and cast. That's it.
